meanings.sent1: I had to resolder the wire to fix the connection.
meanings.sent2: The plumber had to resolder the pipe to stop the leak.
meanings.sent3: After the robot's arm fell off, I had to resolder it back on.
meanings.sent4: She resoldered the broken necklace, mending it with care.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic resoldered the circuit board, making it good as new.

meanings.definition: To join or mend with solder again.
meanings.sent1: He carefully resoldered the broken toy back together.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler had to resolder the ring after it broke.
meanings.sent3: I had to resolder the key back onto the keychain after it fell off.
meanings.sent4: The craftsman resoldered the metal pieces, creating a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent5: She resoldered the handle onto the cup, fixing it perfectly.
